definition: Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen (1845-1923), German mechanical engineer
human relationship/order/coherence
guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general
variant of 琴[qin2], guqin or zither
X-ray/Röntgen or Roentgen ray

sentences.english: Matt is a Chemical Engineering at Laurentian University.
sentences.chinese: 马特是在劳伦琴大学化学工程。

sentences.english: The Rontgen made a careful research to this phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 伦琴对这一现象作了仔细研究。

sentences.english: When Rontgen put his hand before the X-ray, he saw the bones of his hands only.
sentences.chinese: 伦琴把手放在X射线前面时，只见到手上的骨头。

sentences.english: From near and far reporters streamed to interview Rontgen .
sentences.chinese: 远近四方的记者蜂拥而至，采访伦琴。

sentences.english: All of them can be used as secondary standard Rontgen meter and in protection dose measurement.
sentences.chinese: 上述电离室可作次级标准伦琴计和防护剂量测量用。

sentences.english: Rontgen's having discovered X-rays contributed much to world's science .
sentences.chinese: 伦琴发现了x射线对世界科学贡献很大。

sentences.english: Roentgen, French physicist got a good credit as a child, but he is naughty.
sentences.chinese: 法国物理学家伦琴小时候学习成绩很好，但很顽皮。
